## MAPME Initiative {.center background-color="#032733"}


## MAPME Initiative {.smaller}

::: columns

::: {.column width="40%"}
<br>
<br>
[![](assets/mapme-components.svg)](https://www.mapme-initiative.org/){fig-align="left"}
:::


::: {.column width="60%"}
<br>

- **MA**ps for **P**lanning, **M**onitoring, and **E**valuation in the development cooperation sector

- driven by geo-enthusiasts in [KfW](https://www.kfw.de/kfw.de.html), [IRD](https://en.ird.fr/), [AFD](https://www.afd.fr/fr), and [GIZ](https://www.giz.de/) 

- based on the [principles of digital development](https://digitalprinciples.org/):
  - design with people
  - share, reuse, and improve
  - use evidence to improve outcomes
:::

:::
